mapper.update: update jy_member set memberPw = #{memberPw}, memberNickName = #{memberNickName} where memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.select: select product_no, product_name, product_price, product_stock from product
mapper.insert: insert into product(product_no, product_name, product_price, product_stock, product_description, product_cateCode) values(product_seq.nextval, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productStock}, #{productDescription}, #{productCateCode})
